content: I’m living in a five apartments building, and three out of my four neighbors are in my Facebook contacts (in fact, my closest neighbor is my sister). And we’ve even got a private group chat! … For when the heater turns off again in the winter. I guess I’m living in a pretty privileged neighborhood, because there’s little crime here. So your article is quite eye-opening to how other people live. Although it amazes me how you can sleep at all when you’ve got this issue with the garage door opener, and an open connection between the garage and house.
